channel.title: Help pls
channel.description:
ok this keeps happening again and again!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: i keep getting the stupid message that says something like "srry this server must be down..." no matter what server!
and im getting the ports rights so dont post saying "is you port right?"
so if anyone could pls help me!
P.S i have used phonescape , moparscape , ect. . if anyone knows the problem pls tell me!
